data.description: Examines the European context of literary decadence (Baudelaire, Huysmans, Wilde) and how it inspired some of Scandinavia's most important writers (Strindberg, Hamsun, Jacobsen).
data.title: SCANDINAVIAN DECADENCE IN ITS EUROPEAN CONTEXT
